document_data.name: Gilded Gown of Selussa
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gilded Gown of Selussa''' was a tight gauzy [[gown|dress]] made of [[mithral]].
document_data.Abilities: The garment protected the wearer from wounds and reflected ''[[magic missile]]'' spells back to the casters.
document_data.History: Around [[1370 DR]], [[Sarya Dlardrageth]] wore the gown in the ruins of [[Hellgate Keep]].
